panels.visual: Mephits pausing, considering Aggressive stances softening **Caption:** "DC 15 NATURE - 20!"
Verdant Mephit turning fully on Alric Thorny vines wrapping him **Sound EFFECTS:** "WHOOSH-WRAP!"
Alric struggling against vines Barrier gone Lenses clicking into place all around
panels.dialogue: Alric: "No! This isn't—the alignment is mine!"

panels.visual: Verdant Mephit's final strike Thorns piercing Alric **Caption:** "FINAL DAMAGE - ALRIC FALLS!" **Sound EFFECTS:** "THUD"
